programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Asta get surprise visits; Ben grows suspicious of Mike and Liv's private investigation.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Asta team up with an unlikely ally to try to save the Earth.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A popular high school student is found murdered in her bed; two students help police solve the case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a woman disappears after an encounter on a train, her family hires detectives to investigate.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a woman disappears after an encounter on a train, her family hires detectives to investigate.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Woman disappears from grocery store parking lot in Boulder, Colo.; investigators find extraordinary clues in a pair of bloody gloves, unique tire tracks, and ordinary grass and pine needles.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight's son may be involved with the Fitori murder case, intensifying tension between Antonio and Voight; Ruzek helps Burgess get retribution.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight's new Internal Affairs handler proves to be suspicious of his actions; Voight must work with his former partner from the Gang Unit; Halsted enlists Jin to help him gather more information on Lonnie Rodiger; Olinsky takes Ruzek down a peg.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess and Atwater come across a gunshot victim and the only witness is Olinsky's daughter; Ruzek goes to Burgess for help with an undercover mission.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Dueling gangs are suspected when a massacre occurs and $8 million is stolen; Platt asks Ruzek for help.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As Voight and his team search for the bombers, they realize there might be more bombs set to detonate; Burgess' niece fights for her life.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Disgraced Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: Black Panther's mettle as king gets tested when an old enemy draws him into a conflict that puts his nation and the world at risk. The king must soon rally his allies and release his full power to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
programme.desc: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's death.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Disgraced Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the detectives investigate reports of sexual abuse at an elite private school, decades of secrets are exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is arrested for murder in Suffolk County, Detective Benson questions the case and finds enough evidence for District Attorney Barba to charge a different suspect in Manhattan.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 7-year-old girl escapes from her rapist, detectives Benson and Stabler begin an intensive search for the predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of a software company employee leads Benson and Stabler to a fired co-worker who may have a horrifying motive for the slaying.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for the sadist who tortured a senile old woman (Jane Powell), investigating her nursing home, as well as her scheming son (Jay Thomas).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a boy and his abusive guardian leads the detectives to a travel agency specializing in exotic trips for sexual predators.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover that the body of a young woman, found murdered in her apartment, is that of a lawyer who secretly moonlights as a stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a starving toddler is found wandering the streets, detectives are led to a home where another child is in grave condition; Chief Dodds (Peter Gallagher) suggests that Benson's squad may be undergoing changes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing teenager takes an emotional toll on Dodds; DNA evidence could lead to the teen's abductor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The powerful family behind a retail empire defends one of its own from a bartender's rape accusation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A top-level investment banker accuses her billionaire client of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault; Fin makes sure Benson is protected at work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims; Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.
